name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Dill Sauce
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat (375–400°F).
Pat salmon dry, brush with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper.
Grill salmon skin-side down 4–5 minutes; flip and grill 3–4 minutes more until it flakes easily.
Mix yogurt, lemon zest, lemon juice, and dill into a sauce.
Serve salmon topped with lemon–dill sauce.
recommendedSides: Grilled asparagus with olive oil and garlic

name: Slow Cooker BBQ Pulled Pork
instructions: Season pork with salt, pepper, smoked paprika, and garlic powder.
Place in slow cooker with broth and BBQ sauce.
Cook on HIGH 4 hours or LOW 8 hours until fork-tender.
Shred pork with two forks and toss with juices.

name: Oven-Baked Lemon Herb Cod
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Place cod in an oiled baking dish; top with garlic, thyme, lemon slices, salt, and pepper.
Drizzle with olive oil and bake 12–15 minutes until opaque and flaky.
recommendedSides: Steamed green beans with butter (contains Dairy)

name: Grilled Chicken with Mango Salsa
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat (375–400°F).
Brush chicken with oil; season with salt and pepper.
Grill 6–7 minutes per side to 165°F internal.
Combine mango, onion, bell pepper, lime juice, pinch of salt.
Top chicken with salsa and serve.

name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
ingredients: 2 tbsp soy sauce (use tamari to avoid Wheat/Gluten)
instructions: Whisk soy, oyster sauce, and cornstarch; set aside.
Heat oil in a wok over med‑high. Sear beef 2–3 minutes; remove.
Stir‑fry broccoli and garlic 3–4 minutes until crisp‑tender.
Return beef; pour sauce; toss 1 minute until glossy.

name: Ground Turkey Taco Skillet
ingredients: 1 tbsp taco seasoning (check label for Wheat/Gluten)
instructions: Heat oil; brown turkey 5–6 minutes.
Stir in seasoning, beans, corn, and salsa; simmer 3–4 minutes.
Season to taste and serve.
recommendedSides: Warm corn tortillas (may contain Wheat/Gluten if flour)

name: Crockpot Chicken Thighs with Potatoes & Carrots
instructions: Season chicken with salt, pepper, rosemary, and thyme.
Add potatoes, carrots, onion to slow cooker; top with chicken and broth.
Cook on LOW 6–7 hours or HIGH 3–4 hours until chicken is tender (175°F).

name: Shrimp Scampi with Garlic Lemon Butter
instructions: Pat shrimp dry; season with salt and pepper.
Melt butter with oil; sauté garlic 30 sec.
Add shrimp; cook 1–2 min per side.
Pour in wine and lemon juice; simmer 1 min; finish with red pepper flakes.
recommendedSides: Al dente linguine (Wheat/Gluten) or GF pasta

name: Tofu Veggie Stir‑Fry with Peanut Sauce
ingredients: 14 oz firm tofu, pressed and cubed
2 cups mixed veggies (bell pepper, snap peas, carrots)
2 tbsp soy sauce (or tamari to avoid Wheat/Gluten)
instructions: Whisk soy, peanut butter, lime juice, honey, and water; set aside.
Pan‑fry tofu in oil until golden; remove.
Stir‑fry veggies 3–4 minutes; return tofu; pour sauce and toss 1–2 minutes.

name: Baked Chicken Parmesan (Lightened)
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F; line a sheet pan.
Season chicken; dip in egg then breadcrumbs; place on pan.
Bake 15 minutes; top with marinara and cheeses; bake 5 minutes to melt.

name: Ground Beef Taco Bowls
ingredients: 1 tbsp taco seasoning (check label for Wheat/Gluten)
instructions: Brown beef 5–6 minutes; drain excess fat.
Stir in seasoning, corn, and beans; cook 2–3 minutes.
Serve over rice; top with salsa.
recommendedSides: Shredded lettuce and pico de gallo

name: Honey Garlic Glazed Pork Chops
instructions: Season chops with salt and pepper.
Sear in hot oil 3–4 minutes per side; reduce heat.
Add garlic 30 sec; stir in honey, soy/tamari, vinegar; simmer 2–3 minutes to glaze.

name: Sheet‑Pan Lemon Herb Chicken & Veggies
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F.
Toss potatoes and broccoli with half the oil and herbs; spread on sheet pan.
Season chicken with remaining oil, herbs, salt, pepper; arrange with lemon wedges.
Roast 28–32 minutes until 175°F and potatoes are tender.

name: Cajun Shrimp and Sausage Skillet
instructions: Season shrimp with half the Cajun seasoning.
Sear sausage in oil 2–3 minutes; add peppers and zucchini 3–4 minutes.
Add shrimp and remaining seasoning; cook 2–3 minutes until pink.

name: Mediterranean Chickpea Bowl
instructions: Toss chickpeas, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Top with crumbled feta.

name: Teriyaki Salmon Rice Bowls
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Place salmon on foil‑lined pan; brush with teriyaki sauce.
Bake 12–14 minutes until just cooked. Sprinkle with sesame seeds.
Serve over rice with steamed broccoli.

name: Lentil and Spinach Coconut Curry
instructions: Sauté onion in coconut oil 3–4 minutes; add garlic 30 sec.
Stir in curry powder, lentils, coconut milk, and 1/2 cup water; simmer 18–20 minutes until tender.
Fold in spinach until wilted; season with salt.

name: Air Fryer Chicken Thighs (Crispy)
instructions: Preheat air fryer to 380°F.
Pat thighs dry; rub with oil, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Air fry skin‑side up 20–22 minutes until 175°F and crispy.

name: Creamy Tuscan Shrimp
instructions: Sauté shrimp 1–2 minutes per side; remove.
Cook garlic 30 sec; add tomatoes 1–2 minutes; add cream and simmer 2 minutes.
Stir in spinach and Parmesan; return shrimp; season.

name: Turkey Meatballs with Marinara
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F; line a sheet pan.
Mix turkey, breadcrumbs, egg, Parmesan, seasoning, salt, pepper; form 8 meatballs.
Bake 14–16 minutes; simmer in marinara 2–3 minutes before serving.

name: Crockpot Beef Chili
instructions: Brown beef with onion; drain excess fat.
Add to slow cooker with tomatoes, beans, chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Cook on LOW 6–8 hours or HIGH 3–4 hours.

name: Baked Cod with Panko and Herbs
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F.
Mix panko, butter, lemon zest, parsley, salt, and pepper.
Place cod on a lined pan; top with panko mix; bake 12–15 minutes until flaky.

name: Tofu Tikka Masala (Quick)
instructions: Sear tofu in ghee/oil until golden; remove.
Sauté onion 3–4 minutes; stir in garam masala and paprika 30 sec.
Add tomato puree; simmer 5 minutes; add cream; return tofu; simmer 3–4 minutes; season.

name: Grilled Pork Tenderloin with Chimichurri
instructions: Preheat grill to medium‑high. Rub tenderloin with oil, salt, and pepper.
Grill 16–18 minutes, turning every 4–5 minutes, until 145°F; rest 5 minutes.
Mix parsley, garlic, vinegar, extra olive oil, red pepper flakes; slice pork and spoon sauce over.

name: Crockpot White Chicken Chili
ingredients: 1/4 cup sour cream (stir in at end)
instructions: Add chicken, beans, chiles, onion, broth, cumin, oregano, and salt to slow cooker.
Cook on LOW 6–7 hours or HIGH 3–4 hours.
Shred chicken; stir in sour cream; adjust seasoning.

name: Baked Lemon Garlic Chicken Breasts
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F.
Whisk oil, garlic, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper; coat chicken.
Bake 20–22 minutes until 165°F.

name: Spicy Garlic Shrimp Tacos
ingredients: Shredded cabbage and pico de gallo
instructions: Toss shrimp with oil, chili powder, cumin, cayenne, and salt.
Sauté 2–3 minutes until pink.
Warm tortillas; assemble with cabbage and pico.

name: Pan‑Seared Steak with Garlic Butter
ingredients: 2 small ribeye or strip steaks (8–10 oz total)
instructions: Pat steaks dry; season generously with salt and pepper.
Sear in hot oil 2–3 minutes per side for medium‑rare.
Add butter and garlic; baste 30–60 seconds; rest 5 minutes.

name: Crispy Baked Tofu Rice Bowls
ingredients: 14 oz firm tofu, pressed and cubed
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F.
Toss tofu with soy and cornstarch; spread on lined pan; bake 22–25 minutes until crisp.
Serve over rice with steamed broccoli; drizzle sesame oil.

name: Grilled Lemon Pepper Chicken Thighs
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high (375–400°F).
Pat chicken dry; rub with oil, lemon pepper, garlic powder, and salt.
Grill skin-side down 6–7 min; flip and grill 8–10 min until 175°F.
Rest 5 min before serving.

name: Oven-Baked Parmesan Crusted Tilapia
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F.
Mix panko, Parmesan, oil, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Place tilapia on lined sheet; press crumb mix on top.
Bake 12–14 min until flakes easily.

name: Crockpot Honey Garlic Chicken
instructions: Whisk honey, soy/tamari, garlic, and broth.
Add chicken to slow cooker; pour sauce over.
Cook LOW 4–5 hrs or HIGH 2–3 hrs until 165°F.
Shred or slice; spoon sauce over.

name: Air Fryer Salmon with Maple Mustard
instructions: Preheat air fryer to 390°F.
Mix mustard, maple, oil; brush salmon; season with salt and pepper.
Air fry 8–10 min until flaky.

name: Stovetop Creamy Spinach Tortellini
instructions: Boil tortellini per package; drain.
Sauté garlic in butter 30 sec; add cream and simmer 2 min.
Stir in spinach to wilt; fold in tortellini; season.

name: Grilled Shrimp Skewers with Chimichurri
instructions: Soak wooden skewers 10 min; preheat grill to high.
Season shrimp with oil, salt, pepper; thread onto skewers.
Grill 2–3 min per side.
Mix parsley, vinegar, garlic, extra oil; spoon over shrimp.

name: Baked BBQ Meatloaf (Mini)
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Mix beef, breadcrumbs, egg, BBQ sauce, onion powder, salt, pepper.
Form two small loaves; place on lined tray.
Bake 22–25 min until 160°F; brush with extra BBQ sauce if desired.

name: No-Cook Tuna Chickpea Salad
instructions: Flake tuna and combine with chickpeas, olive oil, lemon, parsley, salt, pepper.
Serve chilled.

name: Stove-Top Peanut Noodles with Veggies
instructions: Cook noodles; reserve 1/4 cup pasta water.
Whisk peanut butter, soy, sesame oil, lime, honey with pasta water.
Toss noodles with sauce, carrots, and snap peas.

name: Crockpot Lentil Sweet Potato Stew
instructions: Add all ingredients to slow cooker.
Cook LOW 6–8 hrs or HIGH 3–4 hrs until lentils are tender.
Adjust seasoning before serving.

name: Honey Mustard Trout (Crockpot)
instructions: Add protein, seasonings, and 1/2 cup broth to the slow cooker.
Cook on LOW 4–6 hours (or HIGH half the time) until tender.
Adjust seasoning before serving.

name: Sesame Ginger Trout (No Cook)
instructions: Combine prepared ingredients in a bowl.
Season to taste and serve chilled.

name: Garlic Herb Duck Breast (Oven Bake)
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F and line a sheet pan.
Toss protein with oil and seasonings; arrange on the pan.
Bake 10 minutes until cooked through.

name: Chipotle Lime Chicken Thighs (Oven Bake)
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F and line a sheet pan.
Toss protein with oil and seasonings; arrange on the pan.
Bake 25 minutes until cooked through.

name: Sesame Ginger Salmon (No Cook)
instructions: Combine prepared ingredients in a bowl.
Season to taste and serve chilled.

name: Creamy Parmesan Ground Turkey (Stove Top)
instructions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Sear protein 3–4 minutes per side until browned.
Sprinkle seasonings; cook until done, about 14 minutes total.

name: Honey Mustard Duck Breast (Stove Top)
instructions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Sear protein 3–4 minutes per side until browned.
Sprinkle seasonings; cook until done, about 14 minutes total.

name: Mediterranean Tempeh (No Cook)
instructions: Combine prepared ingredients in a bowl.
Season to taste and serve chilled.

name: Creamy Parmesan Chicken Thighs (Grill)
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high (375–400°F).
Pat protein dry; toss with oil and seasonings; season with salt and pepper.
Grill 4–6 minutes per side until cooked through.
Rest 3–5 minutes before serving.

name: Mediterranean Chickpeas (Stove Top)
instructions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Sear protein 3–4 minutes per side until browned.
Sprinkle seasonings; cook until done, about 22 minutes total.

name: Sesame Ginger Pork Chops (Oven Bake)
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F and line a sheet pan.
Toss protein with oil and seasonings; arrange on the pan.
Bake 30 minutes until cooked through.

name: Cajun Tofu (No Cook)
instructions: Combine prepared ingredients in a bowl.
Season to taste and serve chilled.

name: Sesame Ginger Steak (No Cook)
instructions: Combine prepared ingredients in a bowl.
Season to taste and serve chilled.

name: Chipotle Lime Eggplant (Stove Top)
instructions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Sear protein 3–4 minutes per side until browned.
Sprinkle seasonings; cook until done, about 20 minutes total.

name: Cajun Scallops (Air Fryer)
instructions: Preheat air fryer to 380–390°F.
Toss protein with oil and seasonings; place in basket.
Air fry 22 minutes, flipping halfway, until cooked through.

name: Honey Mustard Chicken Thighs (Stove Top)
instructions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Sear protein 3–4 minutes per side until browned.
Sprinkle seasonings; cook until done, about 30 minutes total.

name: Smoky Paprika Chicken Thighs (Crockpot)
instructions: Add protein, seasonings, and 1/2 cup broth to the slow cooker.
Cook on LOW 6–8 hours (or HIGH half the time) until tender.
Adjust seasoning before serving.

name: Smoky Paprika Chicken Thighs (Air Fryer)
instructions: Preheat air fryer to 380–390°F.
Toss protein with oil and seasonings; place in basket.
Air fry 25 minutes, flipping halfway, until cooked through.

name: Sesame Ginger Trout (Stove Top)
instructions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Sear protein 3–4 minutes per side until browned.
Sprinkle seasonings; cook until done, about 15 minutes total.

name: Chipotle Lime Lamb Chops (No Cook)
instructions: Combine prepared ingredients in a bowl.
Season to taste and serve chilled.

name: Creamy Parmesan Ground Turkey (Crockpot)
instructions: Add protein, seasonings, and 1/2 cup broth to the slow cooker.
Cook on LOW 7–9 hours (or HIGH half the time) until tender.
Adjust seasoning before serving.

name: Teriyaki Tofu (No Cook)
instructions: Combine prepared ingredients in a bowl.
Season to taste and serve chilled.

name: Sesame Ginger Chicken Thighs (Crockpot)
instructions: Add protein, seasonings, and 1/2 cup broth to the slow cooker.
Cook on LOW 5–7 hours (or HIGH half the time) until tender.
Adjust seasoning before serving.

name: Teriyaki Scallops (Air Fryer)
instructions: Preheat air fryer to 380–390°F.
Toss protein with oil and seasonings; place in basket.
Air fry 14 minutes, flipping halfway, until cooked through.

name: Lemon Pepper Black Beans (Stove Top)
instructions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Sear protein 3–4 minutes per side until browned.
Sprinkle seasonings; cook until done, about 12 minutes total.

name: Mediterranean Pork Tenderloin (No Cook)
instructions: Combine prepared ingredients in a bowl.
Season to taste and serve chilled.

name: Lemon Pepper Salmon (Air Fryer)
instructions: Preheat air fryer to 380–390°F.
Toss protein with oil and seasonings; place in basket.
Air fry 30 minutes, flipping halfway, until cooked through.

name: Smoky Paprika Cauliflower Steaks (Crockpot)
instructions: Add protein, seasonings, and 1/2 cup broth to the slow cooker.
Cook on LOW 4–6 hours (or HIGH half the time) until tender.
Adjust seasoning before serving.

name: Sesame Ginger Cod (Grill)
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high (375–400°F).
Pat protein dry; toss with oil and seasonings; season with salt and pepper.
Grill 4–6 minutes per side until cooked through.
Rest 3–5 minutes before serving.

name: Sesame Ginger Chicken Thighs (No Cook)
instructions: Combine prepared ingredients in a bowl.
Season to taste and serve chilled.

name: Mediterranean Ground Beef (Oven Bake)
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F and line a sheet pan.
Toss protein with oil and seasonings; arrange on the pan.
Bake 15 minutes until cooked through.

name: Mediterranean Eggplant (Oven Bake)
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F and line a sheet pan.
Toss protein with oil and seasonings; arrange on the pan.
Bake 12 minutes until cooked through.

name: Mediterranean Lamb Chops (Air Fryer)
instructions: Preheat air fryer to 380–390°F.
Toss protein with oil and seasonings; place in basket.
Air fry 30 minutes, flipping halfway, until cooked through.

name: Mediterranean Chicken Thighs (Stove Top)
instructions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Sear protein 3–4 minutes per side until browned.
Sprinkle seasonings; cook until done, about 14 minutes total.

instructions: Add protein, seasonings, and 1/2 cup broth to the slow cooker.
Cook on LOW 5–7 hours (or HIGH half the time) until tender.
Adjust seasoning before serving.

instructions: Combine prepared ingredients in a bowl.

instructions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.

Sprinkle seasonings; cook until done, about 10 minutes total.

instructions: Combine prepared ingredients in a bowl.
